document_data.name: Endra "Watchever" Mathlyn
document_data.mainbody:
'''Endra "Watchever" Mathlyn''' was a [[human]] woman of the city of [[Procampur]] in [[the Vast]].

She was a [[priest]]ess of [[Helm]] and was High Guardian of the [[Tower of the Eye]] temple by [[1358 DR]], a position which she still held by [[1367 DR]]. She had 18 subordinate priests and 24 lay-followers.
